title: The Dark Reaches
description: After the Earth was destroyed by ruthless machine intelligences known as the Cold Minds, the remnants of the human race sought refuge among the Hidden Worlds. Now, renegade pilot Linnea Kiaho and her fellow pilot Iain sen Paolo embark on a dangerous journey to EarthÂ's solar system, where humans may have survived. But what they find is a secret so powerful it may save the Hidden WorldsÂ—or shatter them forever.
author: Kristin Landon
